review: Good streaming device for the price

review: Works as expected.  Picture quality is great.  I like it.
author: medmeone

review: Very easy to install. Made my dumb TV smart.
author: dave

review: Just got it on Tuesday, set it up in minutes and it is a great replacement for the "smart" DVD player I was using.
author: Papa Joe

review: For what you paid it's o.k.
author: Norbert Haese

review: I absolutely love my new Fire TV Stick!  I would recommend this item to everybody and will probably buy several!
author: Dennis Hughes "early adopter"

review: Super easy to set up and it works great!  (From a "non-techy" user!)
author: Mary J Mitts

review: Fast and easy to use.  Have another  type of "stick" doesn't respond or work nearly as well.  Would recommend this to anyone, 4 year grandson has it mastered already.  Glad I made the "pre-sale" purchase worth every penny and would even pay full price.  Works as fast or faster than our smart TV!
author: Tony

review: It is great easy setup and works without a hitch and the voice activated remote is unbelievableit is better than any smart tv that has ever been thought. It is even a better invention than sliced bread..
author: Gaylord P. White "Brave Fan"

review: I finally got my Fire TV all setup.... After days of trying to figure out what was wrong... I replaced my Roku stick with the Fire stick and gave the Roku to my daughter.. Her bedroom is next to my bedroom in the house... I couldn't figure out why the Fire stick wouldn't update when the Roku stick which is further away from the router was playing just fine... I gave the Fire stick the same wireless credit that the Roku has... It doesn't.... The fire stick has a weak wifi in it not as strong as the Roku or the Chromecast at further distances... I ended up buying a wifi extender just specifically for my Fire stick because it's the only device that needs it... After extender setup it plays great...
author: L. M. SINGLETON "Book Nerd !!!"
